definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)
group on a tour to get acquainted with the local situation

sentences.english: "The kids took one look at the male pup, a ragamuffin ball of string, and exclaimed, " Andy!
sentences.chinese: 公狗瞧一眼，它像是一只五颜六色又脏又乱的线团。

sentences.english: HAVE you ever tried to undo a bunch of tangled wires or cords?
sentences.chinese: 你曾经试图想要解开一团缠在一起的线团吗？

sentences.english: The tailor was balling the yarn.
sentences.chinese: 裁缝正在把线缠成线团。

sentences.english: Application performance of micro-coil is studied on core flow test.
sentences.chinese: 通过岩心流动试验研究了微线团的应用性能。

sentences.english: Can you distinguish me from this caddice ball?
sentences.chinese: 你能分清哪个是线团，哪个是我吗？

sentences.english: I am a poor girl, and I am rinsing yarn.
sentences.chinese: 我是个可怜的女孩，在这里漂洗线团。

sentences.english: Galaeron's fingers weaved a basket of lines before him.
sentences.chinese: 加拉隆的手指仿佛在编织一篮子线团般舞动。
